english_example_sentence: The experienced teacher will teach an interesting topic to the students tomorrow.
russian_example_sentence: Опытный учитель завтра будет преподавать интересную тему студентам.

turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Deneyimli öğretmen yarın öğrencilere ilginç bir konu ______.
